ComicInfo.Summary:
Ghosts and the Supernatural: A look at various superstitions.
The Ghost of Washington Monument!: Wanaki's ghost is trapped at the location of his murder. Sam Lacy thinks he has gotten away with the crime but a stone from the murder site is used to build the Washington Monument, transporting with it Wanaki's ghost.
And a Sea Specter Answered: Two school teachers fail to heed Poseidon's warning while scuba diving off the coast of Greece.
The Phantom Fielder: Jimmy Parker's ghost returns from the grave to save his team from being killed in an automobile accident.
